projectHeader.title: create-espruino-app comparison with standard uart.js setup
projectHeader.projectDescription: This demo is a simple demonstration of how much faster the cli tool is over a standard node.js espruino set up with React.

details.title: create-espruino-app comparison with standard uart.js setup
details.description: A small clip to showcase how much faster the CLI tool is at creating a simple react app with a connection button.
